mapper.select: SELECT b.bbs_idx,b.bbs_subject,b.bbs_content,b.reg_date,b.bbs_blind,b.reco_count,b.type,b.nickname,b.category_name,b.pet_idx,bi.orifilename ,bi.newfilename FROM bbs b JOIN bbs_img bi ON bi.bbs_idx(+)=b.bbs_idx WHERE bbs_blind='N' AND type='gal' ORDER BY bbs_idx ASC
SELECT m.id,m.nickname,p.dog_cat,p.kind,p.bday,p.pet_name,p.kg,p.pet_idx FROM member m JOIN pet p ON m.id = p.id(+) WHERE m.id=#{param1} AND delegate='Y'
SELECT id,add_id FROM interest WHERE id=#{param1} AND add_id=#{param2}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM interest WHERE id=#{param1} AND add_id=#{param2}
